customizableProducts.q: What types of garments can I customize?
customizableProducts.a: You can customize a wide range of items: t-shirts (short and long sleeve), hoodies, crewneck sweatshirts, caps, mugs, insulated bottles, glassware, and more.

paymentConfirmation.q: Why do I have to pay immediately after customizing my item? Will I receive a confirmation?
paymentConfirmation.a: Yes. Once payment is made and the design is submitted, you will receive a receipt confirmation that your order has been registered. Our team will then send you an approval mockup to confirm that the final design meets your expectations. Once approved, we proceed with production, and you will receive a shipping confirmation email when the order is sent.

printingTypes.a: At Mon Impression, we use several techniques depending on the product type: DTF (Direct-to-Film) for main printing on most garments (durable and high quality), Vinyl also used on certain fabrics for precise rendering, Embroidery (on request) for a premium and professional effect, Sublimation (on request, especially for white or polyester fabrics). For mugs: prints are mainly done in sublimation, but vinyl is also possible depending on the model.

productionTime.a: Our orders are produced quickly and usually shipped within 2 to 5 business days, depending on the type of item, availability and quantity.

quote.q: Can I get a quote before ordering?
quote.a: Yes, absolutely! You can submit your request in the Quote section of the site.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Mon Impression, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information.

section1.title: 1. Information Collection
section1.content: We collect information you provide when creating an order: name, email address, shipping address, and payment information. We also collect designs and images you upload to customize your products.

section2.title: 2. Use of Information
section2.content: Your information is used to process and ship your orders, communicate with you about your order, improve our services and website. We never sell your personal information to third parties.

section3.title: 3. Data Protection
section3.content: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your information. Payments are processed securely through Stripe, and we do not store credit card information on our servers.

section4.title: 4. Information Sharing
section4.content: We share your information only with trusted partners necessary to fulfill your order (payment processors, carriers). These partners are required to protect your information.

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. To exercise these rights, contact us at contact@monimpression.com.

section6.title: 6. Cookies
section6.content: Our site uses cookies to improve your browsing experience and analyze site usage. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

privacy.contact: For any questions regarding this policy, contact us at contact@monimpression.com or at 514-677-2809.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.intro: Welcome to Mon Impression. By using this site and our services, you agree to these terms of use.

section1.title: 1. Products and Customization
section1.content: Mon Impression custom products are made to order according to your specifications. By uploading your designs, you confirm that you hold all necessary rights for their use. We reserve the right to refuse any order containing offensive, illegal elements or that infringe third-party rights.

section2.title: 2. Copyright and Intellectual Property
section2.content: You retain ownership of your designs. By submitting your illustration, you grant us a non-exclusive license to use your illustration solely for fulfilling your order. We do not sell or share your designs with third parties.

section3.title: 3. Orders and Payment
section3.content: Payment is required at the time of order. Once payment is made, you will receive a confirmation email. Our team will send you an approval mockup before final production. Changes can be made at this stage.

section4.title: 4. Production and Timelines
section4.content: Our orders are usually shipped within 2 to 5 business days. Timelines may vary depending on the type of item, availability, and quantity ordered.

section5.title: 5. Return and Refund Policy
section5.content: Custom products are made to order according to your specifications and are non-refundable except in case of manufacturing defect or error on our part. If you receive a defective product, contact us within 7 days of receipt.

section6.title: 6. Print Quality
section6.content: We strive to faithfully reproduce your designs. However, Mon Impression is not responsible for printing errors due to poor quality images (low resolution, inadequate format). For best results, send your high-resolution files by email.

section7.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
section7.content: Mon Impression is not responsible for delivery delays caused by third-party carriers, events beyond our control, or errors in delivery information provided by the customer.

terms.contact: For any questions regarding these terms, contact us at contact@monimpression.com or by phone at 514-677-2809.
